name: Intro to Blockchain
description1: Learn about the fundamentals of blockchain technology and what its use cases are.
descritpion2: This course is suitable for beginners without any technical knowledge.

name: Solidity 101
description1: Introducing the Solidity programming language for smart contracts.
descritpion2: This course is suitable for software developers who have no prior knowledge of Solidity.

name: Solidity 102
description1: An intermediate course on programming smart contracts using the Solidity language.
descritpion2: To take this course, you need to complete and pass Solidity 101.
